Worker Katensa:
Phase 1 of the project is to empty the Fields of Silence and Whispers. The creatures there hassle our developers too much.
Which creatures? Mucrokian Fanatics, Mucrokian Ascetics, Mucrokian Saviors, Mucrokian Prophets, Contaminated Mucrokians, and Awakened Mucrokians. Tell you what. Bring me some Mucrokian Hides and maybe a Quality Mucrokian Hide.
Show no mercy!
